headline.main: Standard Life and Aberdeen Agree on Terms for Merger
headline.print_headline: Standard Life and Aberdeen Agree on Terms for Merger

lead_paragraph: Investment firm Standard Life agreed Monday to buy Aberdeen Asset Management for 3.8 billion pounds ($4.7 billion) to create Britain's largest asset management company.
snippet: Investment firm Standard Life agreed Monday to buy Aberdeen Asset Management for 3.8 billion pounds ($4.7 billion) to create Britain's largest asset management company....
